languages.text: {n}Фыркнув, чудовище выпячивает колесом гигантскую грудь.{/n} "Я — акофист. Слуга хозяина Тервантьяса, погонщик мяса".
{n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an Acothyst. Servant of Master Tervantias, his meat driver."
languages.original_text: {n}Фыркнув, чудовище выпячивает колесом гигантскую грудь.{/n} "Я — акофист. Слуга хозяина Тервантьяса, погонщик мяса".

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an acothyst. Servant of master Tervantias, his meat driver."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}怪物は鼻を鳴らし、巨大な胸を膨らませる。{/n}「俺はアコシスト。テルヴァンティアス様の従者であり、肉の導き手だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an Acothyst. Servant of Master Tervantias, his meat driver."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物は鼻を鳴らし、巨大な胸を膨らませる。{/n}「俺はアコシスト。テルヴァンティアス様の従者であり、肉の導き手だ」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}怪物喷着鼻息，挺起硕大的胸膛。{/n}“我是凌虐之首，是特万提亚斯主人的仆从，也是他的赶畜人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an Acothyst. Servant of Master Tervantias, his meat driver."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物喷着鼻息，挺起硕大的胸膛。{/n}“我是凌虐之首，是特万提亚斯主人的仆从，也是他的赶畜人。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}El monstruo resopla e hincha su enorme pecho.{/n} «Soy un acotista. Sirviente del amo Tervantias, su controlador de carne».
languages.original_text: {n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an Acothyst. Servant of Master Tervantias, his meat driver."

traits.locale_text: {n}El monstruo resopla e hincha su enorme pecho.{/n} «Soy un acotista. Sirviente del amo Tervantias, su controlador de carne».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Das Monster schnaubt und streckt seine gewaltige Brust heraus.{/n} "Ich bin ein Akothyst. Diener von Meister Tervantias. Sein Fleischfahrer."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an Acothyst. Servant of Master Tervantias, his meat driver."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Monster schnaubt und streckt seine gewaltige Brust heraus.{/n} "Ich bin ein Akothyst. Diener von Meister Tervantias. Sein Fleischfahrer."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Le monstre renâcle et gonfle la poitrine.{/n} « Je suis un acothyste. Un serviteur de maître Tervantias. Son chauffeur de viande. »
languages.original_text: {n}The monster snorts and puffs out its massive chest.{/n} "I am an Acothyst. Servant of Master Tervantias, his meat driver."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monstre renâcle et gonfle la poitrine.{/n} « Je suis un acothyste. Un serviteur de maître Tervantias. Son chauffeur de viande. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Canavar, homurdanarak devasa göğsünü şişiriyor.{/n} "Ben bir Havaristim. Efendi Tervantias'ın hizmetkârıyım. Etlerini yönetirim."
